participant_abstract.sent: The meeting was well laid out and better planning was obvious in everyone's presentatio.
The project manager was good at keeping the discussion goinng.
Everyone contributed well to the meeting and the ideas and issues that were raised were interrsting and useful.

participant_actions.sent: The next meeting is concerned with more specific designs and features of the remote control.
The project manager will continue to lead discussion.
The ID will look at more specific design materials that will make the remote economically and functionally viable.
The UID will concentrate on the design of the remote and how its features are presented.
The ME will see if our ideas are sellable on an international market and whether they will appeal to our target group of 20-30 year olds.

participant_decisions.sent: Must incorporate company logo and colours.
10-15 second light upp when buttons are used.
RR symbol lights up as well.
Remote can be personalised - interchangable covers.
Minimise buttons alarm which can be adhered to TV set.

participant_problems.sent: Did not have time to discuss battery issues.
Time was limited so not all issues were sufficiently discussed and resolves.
Decisions were sometimes made before all participants had their say. some of the issues were not definitely resolved and I'm unsure of some of the exact decisions.
